member.name: T:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.Common
member.summary: This class provides a common access point for all DB queries.

member.name: M:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.Common.ExecuteDataTable(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a DataTable containing the results of a query.
member.param: String indicating the query to issue.
member.returns: DataTable containing the results of the query.

member.name: M:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.Common.ExecuteCommand(System.String)
member.summary: Executes a SQL command on the database.
member.param: String indicating the command to issue.
member.returns: Integer indicating the number of rows affected.

member.name: M:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.Common.ToDBString(System.String)
member.summary: Makes an input string safe to be used in a database query.
member.param: String containing the value to be sanitized.
member.returns: String containing the sanitized, database-safe value.

member.name: M:ASI.ScaleTraining.DataAccess.Common.Common.GetConnectionString
member.summary: Reads a text file containing the DB information.
